dependencies.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.
dependencies.name: py-flake8

dependencies.description: Check PEP-8 naming conventions, plugin for flake8.
dependencies.name: py-pep8-naming

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: tox is a generic virtualenv management and test command line tool.
dependencies.name: py-tox

dependencies.description: Twine is a utility for publishing Python packages on PyPI.
dependencies.name: py-twine

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
MXNet is a deep learning framework designed for both efficiency and
flexibility.
dependent_to.name: mxnet

dependent_to.description:
PODIO, or plain-old-data I/O, is a C++ library to support the creation
and handling of data models in particle physics.
dependent_to.name: podio

dependent_to.description:
A code generator that fuses subsequent batched matrix multiplications
(GEMMs) into a single GPU kernel, holding intermediate results in shared
memory as long as necessary.
dependent_to.name: py-chainforgecodegen

dependent_to.description:
FORD, standing for FORtran Documenter, is an automatic documentation
generator for modern Fortran programs.
dependent_to.name: py-ford

dependent_to.description:
The Synthetic Data Vault (SDV) is a Synthetic Data Generation ecosystem
of libraries that allows users to easily learn single-table, multi-table
and timeseries datasets to later on generate new Synthetic Data that has
the same format and statistical properties as the original dataset.
dependent_to.name: py-sdv

dependent_to.description:
XGBoost is an optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed
to be highly efficient, flexible and portable.
dependent_to.name: py-xgboost

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
